alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Howard; Sherman; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 7:01AM CDT until September 23 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CDT FOR GREELEY...VALLEY...SHERMAN AND HOWARD COUNTIES... At 701 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fort Hartsuff State Park to near Loup City, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Ord, Greeley, St. Paul, Loup City, Spalding, Scotia, Arcadia, North Loup, Wolbach, Elba, Ashton, Farwell, Elyria, Cotesfield, Cushing, Fort Hartsuff State Park, and Sherman Reservoir Dam. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
